articles.title: Racketeering was a ‘stretch’ in Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs trial, legal experts say - The Washington Post
articles.summary: Racketeering was a ‘stretch’ in Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs trial, legal experts say A federal court jury in the Sean “Diddy” Combs case rejected the government’s theory that he ran a criminal enterprise that helped him carry out serious crimes. A courtroom sketch shows Sean “Diddy” Combs's reaction Wednesday as the courtroom deputy reads verdicts during his sex-trafficking trial in New...

articles.title: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ Heading To $28M Wednesday, Near $128M 5-day Opening In Sight - Deadline
